summary: Tasks menu, three Task pages/routes, task interaction UI, and sitemap updates are implemented. However, the Home page is not simplified to only the Welcome section plus a single CTA button; it still renders additional CTA card content (icon, heading, paragraph, wrapper section). Several unrelated styling/content/config changes also appear in the diff summary but were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Simplify the Home page (route "/") so it only renders the existing Welcome section and a single call-to-action button labeled "Join My Team"; remove all other current Home page sections.
missing_requirements.reason: The updated Home page still renders additional UI beyond WelcomeSection and a single button (e.g., an entire section/card with icon, heading, descriptive paragraph). This is more than "Welcome section + exactly one prominent button".

hallucinated_features.description: Broader site/theme styling and design token changes (neon/rainbow utilities, animations, gold branding utilities) beyond adding Tasks navigation and task pages.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; the request is focused on moving Daily Task off the homepage into Tasks navigation and adding task routes/UI, not global theme restyling.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates/additions to blog sample fallback content and related blog fetching hooks/config unrelated to Tasks navigation/page move.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states not to change existing blog functionality beyond navigation updates needed to add the Tasks menu; the diff summary indicates blog data/hook changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Inclusion of specific external shrinkme.click task URLs for Task 1â€“3.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires a Start Work button that opens a task link, but does not specify introducing/locking in particular third-party URLs.
